name: Smash Fit!
description:
-Simple and beautiful graphics design.
-User friendly UI system.
-Easy gameplay.

-How To Play-

-Swipe to throw the broken piece of ring so that it can fit in the ring perfectly.
-If you miss the target you will lose the game.
-Throw the broken piece when target is align perfectly straight.

-Tips-

-Movement of ring is not constant.
-Stay active, movement of rings can dodge you
